Package mars.riscv.hardware

Class MemoryConfigurations

  • java.lang.Object
    • mars.riscv.hardware.MemoryConfigurations

  • public class MemoryConfigurations
extends java.lang.Object
    Models the collection of RISCV memory configurations. The default configuration is based on SPIM. Starting with MARS 3.7, the configuration can be changed.
    Version:
    August 2009
    Author:
    Pete Sanderson
